dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form

Class ComboBoxCellEditorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.CellEditorFactory
      • dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.form.ComboBoxCellEditorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dreisoft.tresos.lib2.ui.tree.ICellEditorFactory

    public class ComboBoxCellEditorFactory
extends CellEditorFactory
    A ComboBoxCellEditorFactory is used for editing enumeration cell values via a ComboBox.

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    11

      • doConvertCellValueToEditorValue

        public java.lang.Object doConvertCellValueToEditorValue(java.lang.String value)
        Creates an editor value useable by the cell editor. To create the editor value the method must query the list of available values. These values are queried via the method doGetRange().
        Overrides:
        doConvertCellValueToEditorValue in class CellEditorFactory
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        Returns:
        the converted object
        Since:
        11
        See Also:
        CellEditorFactory.doConvertCellValueToEditorValue(java.lang.String)

      • doGetRange

        protected java.lang.String[] doGetRange()
        Query the available values for the ComboBox. This default implementation returns the range from SWTColumnDescription.getRange().
        Returns:
        The available values
        Since:
        11

      • doConvertEditorValueToCellValue

        public java.lang.String doConvertEditorValueToCellValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Converts the value returned by the cell editor back to a cell value.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the converted value
